function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to follow established protocols and safety procedures by healthcare workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent consumption of alcohol could potentially increase the health problems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thermal scanners are not an effective method for diagnosis of covid-19, as it can only detect fever and infected individuals may not have fever yet.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased usage of mobile applications may lead to prolonged screen time, contributing to sedentary behaviors and potential health issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly designed or maintained mobile health m-health applications may lead to inaccurate health information, misdiagnosis, and ineffective treatment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data privacy and security measures in mobile applications may result in unauthorized access to personal health information and potential data breaches.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots in healthcare could transmit contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between patients.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on robots in healthcare may lead to reduced human interaction and personalized care, impacting patient well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper data security and privacy measures in robotics and communication systems poses a risk of sensitive healthcare information exposure.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of samples during drone transportation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public engagement for supply requirements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of surveillance drones leading to privacy concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines during the delivery of goods and basic needs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transportation of biological samples by drones","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delivery of medical supplies to austere territories using drones","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of infection through patient bookings and virtual doctor interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on iot for healthcare operations and drug delivery during epidemics.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for the delivery of medical supplies and goods during epidemics.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of ai in surgical fields may hinder the potential for quality healthcare and evidence-based clinical decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to implement ai in the surgical field for treating covid-19 infected patients may hinder the use of ai for patient treatment and ventilator parameter adjustments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited utilization of ai technology in clinical trials and medicine development may slow down the process of achieving precise results and accelerating medicine and vaccine development.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited implementation of ai and machine learning in healthcare","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential reliance on ai and machine learning for critical healthcare decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot and drone technology","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance may infringe on privacy rights of individuals.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance technology may be used for purposes other than controlling the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on surveillance technology may create a false sense of security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online education platforms may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly managed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Live-streamed online sessions may pose a risk of disease transmission if participants are not following hygiene guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online competitions and initiatives may inadvertently lead to gatherings that increase the risk of disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreads easily and infected individuals may not show symptoms for 1-14 days.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Robots assisting healthcare workers may fail to prevent the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized or maintained.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technological strategies for work from home, distance learning, and surveillance may lead to increased reliance on technology and potential privacy and security risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exponential increase in the use of telemedicine technology and chatbots","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in getting basic needs during quarantine period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manufacturing technology adaptation for producing medical equipment may pose contamination risks due to the introduction of new materials and production processes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced capacity of health care workers to manage increased workload and handle medical supplies, leading to potential errors and contamination risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supply chain for medical equipment, testing facilities, and protection equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infection through contaminated surfaces and air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on a single ventilator design and manufacturer","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to lack of social distancing in purchasing basic necessities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in accessing and analyzing scientific literature related to covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing supply chain and tele-health facilities during the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of social media data for disease tracking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact-tracing app tracking personal movements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai in healthcare chatbots","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of antibiotic-resistant bacteria due to misclassification of bacterial protective antigens bpas by ai in reverse vaccinology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misidentification or misinterpretation of clinical trial outcomes by ai, leading to incorrect drug development decisions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate prediction of ventilator settings by ml, impacting patient treatment and respiratory illness management.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai in disease diagnosis may lead to misdiagnosis or false positives, potentially causing harm to patients.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
